h1: How Many Calories in a Tablespoon of Brown Sugar?
assumptions: Standard packed tablespoon (~12 g), light brown sugar, no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, packing density, moisture content, and type (light vs. dark). Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One tablespoon of brown sugar contains about 52 calories, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a tablespoon of brown sugar?
Is brown sugar higher in calories than white sugar?
faqs.a: Similar calories; brown has ~52 kcal per tbsp vs. 49 for white, due to molasses.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a tablespoon of brown sugar?
faqs.a: About 13.5 g carbs, all from sugars, with 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does brown sugar have any protein or fat?

faqs.q: How does packing affect calories in brown sugar?
faqs.a: Packed is denser (~12 g, 52 kcal); unpacked is lighter (~8 g, ~35 kcal).
